articles.description:
Since I‚Äôve been asked a lot:
Buy stock in several companies that make products & services that *you* believe in.

articles.description:
Re @pegobry @pmarca Exactly. Right before he died, Jack Bogle (of Vanguard fame) said index/passive funds were too great a percentage of the market and he really knew what he was talking about! 
There should be a shift back towards active investment. Passive has gone too far.
